channel.title: Data on Doug Johnson
channel.description: Recent content in Data on Doug Johnson

item.title: IHDS Quick Start Guide
item.description: I recently used data from the India Human Development Survey (IHDS) for a paper on learning outcomes data in India. IHDS is a panel survey led by Sonalde Desai and others at NCAER/UofMd which collected on a wide range of topics from ~42,000 households across India. The survey includes two rounds of data collection, the first round in 2004/5 and the second round in 2011/12. (According to the website, a third round is in the works.
